entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv and dqc_0011.csv successful. - /var/folders/18/_kbcbv855dxf82x5yvny6h0c0000gn/T/tmp88n563e2/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0013.2781] It is expected that us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxCreditsOther with a value of -0.001 will be reported with a value equal to or greater than zero if net income before tax is positive. In this case net income before tax is 185,900,000. The value reported for the tax rate reconciliation item is less than zero. The preparer should consider if the value is input correctly for this assertion and, after considering the appropriateness of the input, if incorrect, input the amount as a positive (i.e., absolute) value and provide a negated label, if desired, for rendering purposes.
The properties of this us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxCreditsOther fact are: Period :2016-01-01 to 2016-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : pure Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1062047/000106204718000012/cvg-20171231.xml 4592

property.name: label
property.value: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0013.2785] It is expected that us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationRepatriationOfForeignEarnings with a value of -0.01 will be reported with a value equal to or greater than zero if net income before tax is positive. In this case net income before tax is 177,000,000. The value reported for the tax rate reconciliation item is less than zero. The preparer should consider if the value is input correctly for this assertion and, after considering the appropriateness of the input, if incorrect, input the amount as a positive (i.e., absolute) value and provide a negated label, if desired, for rendering purposes.
The properties of this us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationRepatriationOfForeignEarnings fact are: Period :2015-01-01 to 2015-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : pure Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1062047/000106204718000012/cvg-20171231.xml 4591

property.name: label
property.value: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
